mapper.insert: insert into post(num, category, email, title, subtitle, fcontent, ccontent, good, hash, report, pdate, url, count) values(post_seq.nextval, #{category}, #{email}, #{title}, #{subtitle}, #{fcontent}, #{ccontent}, 0, #{hash}, 0, sysdate, #{url}, 0)
mapper.update: update post set count = count+1 where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select b.CATEGORY_NAME from blogcategory b where BLOG_TITLE=#{title}
select count(*) from post where url=#{url}

select.if: select pl.*,pg.email as heart from (select tmp3.*, m.nickname as nick from (select tmp2.* from (select rownum as r, tmp.* from (select * from (select post.*,sc.address as sc from post left join (select * from subscribe where email=#{email})sc on post.url=sc.address) where sc is not null order by num desc)tmp)tmp2 where tmp2.r between #{first} and #{last})tmp3 left join member m on m.email=tmp3.email)pl left join (select * from postgood where email=#{email})pg on pl.num=pg.pnum

mapper.insert: insert into postgood(num, pnum, email, pgdate) values(postgood_seq.nextval, #{num}, #{email}, sysdate)
